ackage com.day4.operator;

public class OperationalOperatoras {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int a, b;
a = 20;
b = (a == 1) ? 30 : 40;
System.out.println("value of b is :" + b);
b = ( a == 1) ? 30:40;

System.out.println("value of b is :" + b);
	}

}
